code: import React from"react";import Chart from"../Chart/Chart";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ExpensesChart(props){const chartDataPoints=[{label:'Jan',value:0},{label:'Feb',value:0},{label:'Mar',value:0},{label:'Apr',value:0},{label:'May',value:0},{label:'Jun',value:0},{label:'Jul',value:0},{label:'Aug',value:0},{label:'Sep',value:0},{label:'Oct',value:0},{label:'Nov',value:0},{label:'Dec',value:0}];for(const expense of props.expenses){const expenseDate=new Date(expense.date);const expenseMonth=expenseDate.getMonth();chartDataPoints[expenseMonth].value+=expense.amount;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chart,{dataPoints:chartDataPoints});};
